trans-unit.source: Recognizes ink gestures.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjenner farge bevegelser.

trans-unit.source: A GestureRecognizer identifies an ink gesture.
trans-unit.target: En GestureRecognizer identifiserer en farge bevegelse.

trans-unit.source: You can set the GestureRecognizer to recognize all or a subset of application gestures.
trans-unit.target: Du kan konfigurere GestureRecognizer ikke gjenkjenne alle eller et delsett av programmet bevegelser.

trans-unit.source: To set the GestureRecognizer to recognize a subset of the available gestures, pass an <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture> array to the constructor or use the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.SetEnabledGestures%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi GestureRecognizer ikke gjenkjenne et delsett av de tilgjengelige bevegelsene, kan du sende en <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>matrisen til konstruktøren, eller bruk den <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.SetEnabledGestures%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.SetEnabledGestures%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>

trans-unit.source: To determine whether a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> contains a gesture, call the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.Recognize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Å finne ut om en <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>inneholder en bevegelse, kall av <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.Recognize%2A>metode.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.Recognize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage You cannot use this class in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: ## XAML teksten Bruk du kan ikke bruke denne klassen i [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: When it is created with this constructor, the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> recognizes all application gestures.
trans-unit.target: Når den opprettes med denne konstruktøren den <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>gjenkjenner alle programmet bevegelser.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Use the GestureRecognizer constructor to create a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> that recognizes a subset of the application gestures.
trans-unit.target: Bruk konstruktøren GestureRecognizer til å opprette en <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>som gjenkjenner et delsett av programmet bevegelser.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture"></xref> that specifies the application gestures the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"></xref> will recognize.
trans-unit.target: En matrise av typen <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture"> </xref> som angir programmet bevegelser den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"> </xref> gjenkjenner.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Frigir alle ressursene som brukes av den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you finish using the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>.
trans-unit.target: Kall avhending når du har avsluttet <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Fjerningsmetoden forlater den <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>i en ubrukelig tilstand.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, after calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Derfor etter kaller avhending, må du frigi alle referanser til den <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>Slik saneringsoppsamlingen kan gjenvinne minnet som den <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>ble bruker.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Alltid kall fjerne før du slipper siste referanse til <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: Ellers ressurser den bruker vil ikke bli frigjort før saneringsoppsamling kall av <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>objektets `Finalize` metode.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: Gets the gestures that the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"></xref> recognizes.
trans-unit.target: Henter bevegelsene som den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"> </xref> gjenkjenner.

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture"></xref> that contains gestures the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"></xref> is set to recognize.
trans-unit.target: En matrise av typen <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture"> </xref> som inneholder bevegelser den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"> </xref> er satt til igjen.

trans-unit.source: Gets a Boolean that indicates whether the gesture recognizer is available on the user's system.
trans-unit.target: Henter en boolsk verdi som angir om bevegelse gjenkjenner er tilgjengelig på systemet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the recognition component is available; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis recognition-komponenten er tilgjengelig. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Looks for gestures in the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ser etter bevegelser i det angitte <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The array returned by the Recognize method is sorted by the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult.RecognitionConfidence%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Matrisen som returneres av metoden Gjenkjenn er sortert etter den <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult.RecognitionConfidence%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult.RecognitionConfidence%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For example, Recognize may return a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult> array with the following values: |Index|ApplicationGesture|RecognitionConfidence| |-----------|------------------------|---------------------------| |0|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>| |1|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>| |2|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>| |3|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>| This means that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> recognizes that it is very likely that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is a check mark, relatively likely that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> in not a gesture, and not at all likely that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is a curlicue or a double curlicue.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjenn kan for eksempel returnere en <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult>matrise med følgende verdier: | Indeksen | ApplicationGesture | RecognitionConfidence | |-----------|------------------------|---------------------------| |&0; | <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>| <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>| |&1; | <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>| <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>| |&2; | <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>| <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>| |&3; | <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>| <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>| Dette betyr at den <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>gjenkjenner at det er svært sannsynlig som den <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>er merket, relativt sannsynlige som den <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>ikke en bevegelse, og at ingenting sannsynligvis som den <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>er en curlicue eller en dobbel curlicue.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Recognize method can return an array with <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture> at a higher <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence> than other application gestures.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > For gjenkjenner metoden kan returnere en matrise med <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>høyere <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>enn andre programmet bevegelser.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>

trans-unit.source: This means that it is more likely that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is not a gesture, as opposed to a gesture that has a lower <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>.
trans-unit.target: Dette betyr at den er større sannsynlighet som <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>er ikke en bevegelse, i motsetning til en bevegelse som er lavere <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref> to search for gestures.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref> til å søke etter bevegelser.

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult"></xref> that contains application gestures that the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"></xref> recognized.
trans-unit.target: En matrise av typen <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult"> </xref> som inneholder programmet gestures som den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"> </xref> gjenkjennes.

trans-unit.source: Sets the application gestures that the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"></xref> recognizes.
trans-unit.target: Angir program-bevegelser som den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"> </xref> gjenkjenner.

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture"></xref> that specifies the application gestures you wish the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"></xref> to recognize.
trans-unit.target: En matrise av typen <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture"> </xref> som angir program-bevegelser du ønsker den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"> </xref> ikke gjenkjenne.
